1.content:
It all happened on a regular Friday afternoon.

It had taken many months, but you've finally managed to finish development of your latest and greatest invention! It was a revolutionary device capable of influencing the size of matter.

Today was the big day that you decided to begin testing. You were beaming with pride as you glanced down at the device sitting on your bedroom work desk.

The metallic device was about a foot tall and wide like a boombox. Its base was covered with various switches and buttons that would make any average person dizzy. Its most prominent feature however was a shiny red bulb hanging down inside the heart of the device. It looked like something straight out of a mad scientists' lab.

“Finally ready to test this baby out~!” You muttered to yourself with a pie-eating grin. Just as you prepared to flick on the device, the bedroom door behind you audibly creaked open...

Upon turning around, you immediately caught sight of your nine year old brother peaking his head through the doorway.

"Kyle! What did I said about coming into my room!?” You groaned with annoyance.

"Err.. I'm not actually IN your room” the boy said meekly, with a hint of playfulness.

"Don't be a smartass. What do you want?" You were already growing impatient with the boy.

"Mom and Dad just left for their trip. They told me to tell you that breakfast is on the table....” Kyle replied.

"Oh crap....they left already?? ...” You muttered, guiltily rubbing the back of your head. You were so busy with your work that you didn't get to see them off.

Both you and your brother were going to be home alone while your parents were away on a weekend long sailing trip.

“Hey, what's that thing???” Kyle asked, staring at the strange looking contraption on your desk. His eyes were gleaming with child-like curiosity.

It took a moment for you to realize Kyle was referring to your matter altering device.

“It's none of your business. Now get out. I'm busy” You curtly replied. Your brother was always such a nosy nuisance whenever he caught wind of your inventions.


“Woaaah, what do all those buttons and switches do??” Kyle persisted as he took a step forward into the room.

Now you were really getting frustrated.

“Kyle, I'm not kidding around! The last time I showed you one of my inventions you ended up breaking it, remember??”

“Aww! Pleeeease~?? I promise I'll be careful this time!” Kyle pleaded, taking another step forward.

Something inside you finally snapped.

“KYLE! Mom and dad are gone for the weekend. That means I'M in charge! So stop annoying me and GET. OUT. OF. MY. ROOM!” you loudly yelled.

The bright playfulness in Kyle's eyes darkened with disappointment. His hurt expression quickly evolved into one of bitterness.

“Fine! I wasn't even interested in your dumb robot anyways!” Kyle yelled as he pulled the door shut with a loud slam.

“It's not a robot! IDIOT” You shouted back while rolling your eyes.

As silence began to fill the room, you let out a sigh of both relief and guilt. You were happy that Kyle had left, but at the same time you felt sort of bad about how you handled the situation.

You and your brother used to be much closer in the past, but a tumultuous rift had begun to form between you in the past year or so. You both had very different personalities and had very little in common. The tension seemed to be getting worse by the day.

You'd actually been planning on reconnecting with him at some point during this weekend, but that seemed pretty unlikely now.

“Well, so much for that..” You shrugged, turning yourself back towards the device.
---------------------
[an hour of tinkering later]

After taking a few more minutes to make sure that you had properly calibrated the device, you were finally ready to test it out for the very first time

“Alright perfect~ Now I just need my test subject~” You stated, walking over to the adjacent desk and picking up the red apple you'd prepared for the test.

“Well....here's to success...” You muttered, giving the apple a quick kiss for good luck. You placed the fruit in a cavity directly underneath the glowing red orb in the center of the device. Just as you were about to press the activation button, the house phone began to ring.

“Oh come on! Really??” You groaned, lowering your hand away from the device.

“KYLE!! ANSWER THE PHONE!”
1.title: It begins..

choices: Press the button V2: The Apple
Press the button V3: Teddy bear
11.content:
After waiting a few moments, you realized that your brother would probably ignore the ringing out of spite.

Normally you'd just ignore it too, but there was a possibility that it might be your parents calling about something important. You groaned before hurrying out of your bedroom to answer it.

As you began to descend the stairs, you failed to notice your little brother peeking his head out from his bedroom further down the hall.

Before you were even out of view, Kyle was already hatching an idea.

The mischievous young boy quickly darted down the hall to your now vacant bedroom. A wide grin spread across his young face as he stared at the untended 'robot' on the desk. He quickly ran up to it and started pressing all the buttons and turning all the dials he could get his hands on.

“Hehe... Let see how long it takes him to fix this!” He giggled to himself.

Before he could mess things up too much, he was cut short by the sound of your footsteps heading back up the stairs.

“Uh oh....” the boy muttered as he totally froze up.

Panicking, Kyle jumped onto your bed and attempted to hide himself behind the assortment of pillows. He held his breath and didn't move a muscle, hoping that neither of his feet or head were peaking into view.

You returned to your room with a scowl. The call ended up being an automated reminder for Kyle's upcoming dental check up. As you stepped into your bedroom, you didn't seem to notice that anything was off.

All your focus had already returned to your device. This was it, it was time to test! No more distractions! You proudly walked up to the desk. Your hands were almost shaking with excitement as you reached out to press the green start-up button.

Meanwhile, Kyle was secretly looking on through a gap in the pillows. He was trying his best to hold in his laughter; He eagerly awaited to see your reaction when you realized all the knobs and switches were all wrong.

You didn't end up checking the calibrations though, confident that they were as you had left them.

It was as if time slowed down as your finger closed in to press the green start-up button; You bit your lower lip as Kyle quietly held his breath with anticipation. The younger sibling wasn't sure what would be the result of his tampering, but he hoped that it would at least be funny.

…....

CLICK
11.title: Mischief

111.content:
A huge red flash spread out from the bulb which enveloped the entire room. The unexpected blast of light caught you totally off guard, forcing you to shield your eyes. You could feel an almost static like cling across your entire body, causing all your hair to stand on end. By the time your eyes recovered, you quickly realized that something was definitely not right. The world around you didn't seem familiar anymore. You had no idea where you were.

“W-what...?!?”

After rubbing your eyes a bit, it became shockingly clear that you were no longer in your bedroom anymore. For starters, you were now standing knee deep countless bushels of thick, rope-like twine. At first you assumed that you were outside, but then your realized the sky was actually a ceiling, and the sun was artificial.

“W-where am I?!” You yelled out in fear as you pushed away at the thick springy ropes engulfing your legs.

As you turned around, you came face to face with something that sent a shiver down your spine.

“No..wait.... that’s .. that’s impossible. … How could...?!”

There, towering over you like a building was a stack of gigantic engineering textbooks.

“Wait....no,...no way…”

You tilted his head higher and higher until you came to finally recognize the huge wooden structure looming over you.

“That’s… my desk…?!!?” You gasped.

All the puzzle pieces were quickly forming into a larger picture.

“I...shrunk??! H-how?! How small am!?” Your heart was now beating like a drum. As you stood there, trying to calm yourself down, a far away noise suddenly captured your attention. There was a loud, ominous shifting sound emanating from the other side of the room where your bed was. The platform where you usually slept now looked absolutely mountainous.

There was a deafening creaking of springs as something large began to shift atop the mattress.

“Wait...what the hel--”

Then, suddenly, without warning....

***THOOOOOOM***

The floor beneath you shook with a force comparable to an earthquake. Before you could stabilize himself, a second tremor knocked you off your feet.

“W-what the hell is happening!?” You screamed, fearfully clinging to one of the countless carpet fibers surrounding you.

The consecutive tremors were rhythmic, and growing more intense by the second. Unsure of what was happening, you just held your head down and braced yourself.

Just as the loud, booming earthquakes were at their worst, the shaking stopped.

You were still trembling as you slowly lifted up your head and opened your eyes. For some reason, everything on the floor around you seemed a little bit darker.

It was only when you finally looked up that you realized why.

You were being eclipsed by the shadow of an colossal giant standing over you..

The blood rushed from your face, leaving you ghost white as you recognized the looming titan.

“k-k……” You were unable to summon words. Nearly two yards away from you were two massive, socked, house-sized feet connected to two colossal legs covered by a familiar pair of blue pajamas. You continued to tilt your head higher up to a white white tee-shirt.

“Oh god.....” You whimpered.

Beyond the tee-shirt was your younger brother’s head, which was tilted down towards your direction. The giant boy's seemingly blank expression was shrouded in shadow.
111.title: Contact

1111.content:
--------

- Kyle's POV moments earlier-

The bright light caused Kyle to let out a whimper as he maneuvered his hands to cover his eyes. After a moment of silence, the boy felt compelled to see the results of his mischief.

"(5 4 3 2....)" he counted to himself internally.

"(1!!!)"

Kyle burst from the pillows, preparing to jump off the bed and run for the door while laughing. He stopped short however, after he noticed that his older brother was no longer standing where he had been.

The wide-eyed, gleeful expression on Kyle's face slowly turned to one of puzzlement.

The boy looked suspiciously around the room as he began to wonder if his brother was about to jump out of nowhere and strangle him. That was when he noticed that it wasn't just his brother that was missing, but the 'robot' on the desk was gone too.

Feeling like he should investigate, the boy hesitantly dangled feet over the side of the bed and plopped down onto the floor below. After taking a few steps toward the desk, he came to a stop when he noticed that there was something tiny sitting atop the desk where the 'robot' had been. He leaned over and grabbed it.

"W-woah... the robot... it got super tiny!!" Kyle gasped in awe as he examined the now candy-sized object.

Still suspicious about his brother's whereabouts, he decided to call out your name

"B-brandon, are you in here???"

He looked around the room waiting for a response. The door was still closed. There was no way that his brother had the time to leave the room during the moment that he wasn't looking.

"hmm" Kyle pondered to himself quizzically as he crossed his arms in thought.

Driven by curiosity, Kyle walked over to the bed and got on all fours. He slowly lifted up the hanging bed sheets to see if his brother was hiding under the bed.

"....Where the heck did he go...?" Kyle muttered as he scanned the empty area under the mattress.

"This is so weird...." The boy muttered as he lifted himself back up to his feet. As he stood there contemplating what happened to you, something suddenly caught his attention.

Out of the corner of his eye, the nine year old saw a small movement on the floor nearby.

Kyle looked downward, allowing his eyes lock on to what appeared to be a small insect scurrying towards him from the direction of the desk.

Known to be easily distracted, the 'bug' immediately captured the grade schooler's undivided attention.

The boy turned himself towards the approaching insect and watched with curiosity as the 'ant' crawled right in front of him. It was a scene he had witnessed many times before: an ant mindlessly crawling around on the floor without a care in the world.

Kyle reacted just as any boy his age would react upon seeing such a thing. With a blank, indifferent stare, he began to lift his foot over the tiny pest.
1111.title: Mystery

11111.content:
-Your POV -a minute earlier-

"Kyle!!"

You continue to shout as the boy leans over your desk; his entire mass now looming over you. Adrenaline was pulsing through your entire body. You've never felt so defenseless and insignificant before, ESPECIALLY not in relation to your little brother. Kyle seemed to be looking for something. He was probably trying to figure out where you disappeared to.

"He must have saw the beam go off, but hasn't realized that I've shrunk" you say to yourself as you watch the boy turn around.

You realize that no matter how hard try to yell for his attention, he'll never even hear a squeak of it.

It was then that Kyle began to walk over to the bed. You realize that you're going to need to get his attention if you're ever going regain access to your invention and return to your normal size.

It truly began to dawn on you that your device actually worked. You'd take a moment to celebrate if your current situation wasn't so dire.

"How could this have happened? All the setting were correct! I checked them twice and ever-" You thought to yourself.

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM

The whole floor shook violently, knocking you off your feet again. You winced before trying to lift yourself back up. The tremor was caused by Kyle dropping down on to all fours, likely to continue searching for you.

That was when it hit you; this was your best opportunity to get his attention! You quickly began to run towards his direction.

It didn't take long before you realize how long a distance it was from the desk to your bed. Normally it would only have taken you four footsteps to cover the distance, but now it seemed like a quarter of a mile.

About a half a minute passed as you finally started closing the distance. Just as you began to feel a sense of hope, it was shattered as Kyle started to stand back up.

'NOOoOOOOOO! KYLE I'M DOWN HERE!! KYLE!!!' you screamed at the top of your lungs while waving your arms desperately.

You refused to give up and continued to run.

'KYLE!!!!!! LOOOK LOOOOK!!!!!'

In an instant, Kyle's eyes fixed onto you. You suddenly felt a strange sensation; it was a mixture of joy, combined with an unnerving fear. You ignored these feelings and continued to run and shout

'YESSS!! KYLE I'M HERE!!!!' You shouted with a massive open-mouthed smile across your face.

Kyle turned himself towards your direction as you finally stopped a yard away from his feet.

The boy was staring directly at you, there was no way he hadn't noticed you. You simply stood there waving for moment, waiting for him to kneel down and carefully pick you up. ("Then he would just have to take me up to the device, and I'll just walk him through setting it up and'..")

Your internal dialog suddenly slowed to a halt as you notice that Kyle didn't appear to be displaying any sort of shock or surprise upon seeing you.

'Kyle! Hurry! Pick me up!'

That was when it happened.

Suddenly, Kyle's right leg started to extend forward, lifting his massive socked foot up into the air.

You were utterly speechless as the colossal foot began to envelope you in shadow.

'K-Kyle''

Time seemed to slow as you stared at the impossibly vast sole of your kid-brother's foot.

The fabric underneath was grayed out and slightly moistened by foot sweat. The fabric was cohered directly to the underside of his foot, making all the soft, lumpy details of his sole stand out.

A voice in the back of your head was telling you to run, but your legs wouldn't budge an inch. You could only stand there in complete terror as the young boy's foot hovered directly over you. You felt a wave of absolutely dread washed over you as you realized just how small you had become.

You were the size of a bug, and apparently, that's exactly what your brother had mistaken you as. You realized how huge of a mistake it was trying to get his attention at such a puny size.

It began to occur to you how many insects have died this way; Mostly on accident, but many squashed merely for momentary amusement or satisfaction. There's no way your life could possibly end like this. Squashed beneath your kid brother's foot??

"N-no...NONONO!!!.." You began to enter complete panic mode.

"K-KYLE!! NO!! IT'S ME!! YOUR BROTHER!! KYLE NOOOO!!!"

All you could do was back away and scream in terror as your kid brother's foot quickly began to descend to stomp you flat.
11111.title: Little bug

choices: Maybe this whole situation isn't so bad...[willing]
111111.content:
?!

You slowly open your eyes. Kyle's sole had come to a stop only a mere inch over your head. It was hovering right above you; close enough to touch. Your senses were flooded by its slightly pungent scent.
-------------

Kyle's POV

"Hmm? Huh, that's weird....It's not running away.." He thought to himself in disappointment.

The boy moved his foot away from the trembling 'bug', and set it down to the side.

Feeling more curious about this odd ant, Kyle got down onto his knees and began closer inspection.

"Hmmmmm" he hummed as he focused on the 'insect'.

Suddenly his eyes snapped open.

"W-wait a minute... NO WAYYY!!" ' The boy shouted out in disbelief.

B-BRANDON?!?

------------
BOTH POV

Covering your ears due to the close proximity of Kyle's voice, you looked up at what seemed like a god.

Still trembling due to your near death encounter with your kid-brother's foot, you now found yourself under the presence of Kyle's massive boyish face staring down on you. The scent of maple syrup and pancakes washed over you as the strong gusts of his breathing blasted into you.

"Y-yes! Kyle! It's me!!" You began to call out. This was the first time in your life that you've ever been intimidated by your younger brother. Kyle wasn't even trying to come off that way intentionally, he was just SO gargantuan.

"WOW, you shrunk!!!" Kyle yelled.

Regaining your composure, you stood up and started to shout more confidently.

"Yes!! My machine shrunk me! You need to carry me over to it so we can fix this!'

'I CAN'T BELIEVE HOW LITTLE YOU ARE~' Kyle shouted again.

It seemed as though Kyle was able to hear you. That was a good sign. The problem was that he didn't really seem very interested in anything you were saying.

"Kyle! You need to listen! You need to carry me to my desk!"

"Your desk?" the boy questioned innocently.

"Wait! Oh yeah! The robot!" He shouted excitedly'


Without warning, Kyle stood up and reached over to the desk. He lowered himself back down and carefully placed the machine on the floor next to you.

You gasped in shock. The machine had shrunk along with you! In a way you were slightly relieved that you didn't need to talk Kyle through resetting the device himself.

"Good! Now I just need to fix the settings and..."

Suddenly a shadow loomed over you. You slowly looked up to see Kyle's massive hand descending upon your position.

"K-Kyle.. wait..what are you?! KYLE! NO!!"
111111.title: Conversation

choices: Kyle begs to play for just a little longer
1111111.content:
You instinctively began to run, but it was a pointless effort. Kyle's massive fingers quickly curled around you, effortlessly carrying you up to his face. He opened his hand, sending you tumbling into his palm. The massive fleshy surface extended out in all directions. Above you was Kyle's massive smiling face, staring down on you as if he had just picked up a shiny quarter. He never imagined he'd get a chance to hold a tiny person like this, let alone his OWN brother. Something about the experience sort of made him feel all excited and tingly inside.

"This is so cool!" The colossal boy whispered, utterly fascinated with your new size.

"Kyle! What were you thinking!? You could have hurt me! You need to be careful!" You shouted out condescendingly, attempting to re-assert your control over the situation.

"O-oh.....sorry!" Kyle said with genuine concern; It didn't last long though, as his face reverted to one of playful awe.

"Wow... I really almost stepped on you' back then! haha.." You can tell by Kyle's introspective expression that he was imagining what it would have looked like had he finished lowering his foot.

"A-alright Kyle! You need to bring me to my device! I need to fix this!!"

"Haha, I didn't think messing with that robot would cause something like THIS to happen." Kyle began to laugh.

It took a second for the boy's words to sink in. You couldn't believe it...

"Wait....WHAT?!? YOU DID THIS??!" You yelled out in anger.

"Mmhmm!" Kyle playfully hummed while trying to hold in his trademark giggle. He didn't appear to think that this situation was serious at all.

You realized that he must have tampered with the device while you went downstairs to answer the phone.

"THIS ISN'T FUNNY! YOU'RE GOING TO BE IN SO MUCH TROUBLE WHEN I GET BACK TO NORMAL"

The big dumb smile on Kyle's face immediately faded. He knew how badly he was going to be punished once you returned to your normal size.

("If only I could just keep him this way....") The giant boy's thoughts began to stir as he looked down at his palm, his gaze fixed in on your puny form.

All at once, Kyle suddenly seemed to realize the opportunity he had within his grasp.
1111111.title: Power struggle

choices: Kyle brings you down to the kitchen.
11111111.content:
You continued yelling until you noticed something unsettling. Kyle was smiling again.

“W-why the heck are you--?” You began to speak.

“I just realized. Why do I gotta listen to what YOU say? Technically I'M the big brother now~” Kyle smugly stated.

You were completely taken off guard by the sudden shift in your younger brother's demeanor.

“KYLE, I'm serious! If you don't take me to the device right now I'll--!” You began to yell.

“You'll what, little buggy?~” Kyle giggled. He was now grinning from ear to ear. He loved how he could belittle you and not worry about the consequences. As long as you were tiny like this, he didn't have to worry at all.

Before you could counter with a response, you realized that Kyle's fingers were slowly beginning to rise up around you.

“H-hey! What are you?! HEY ! KYLE STOP!”

The last thing you saw before you were sealed from the light was your little brother's big cheeky grin.
11111111.title: How about..

111111111.content:
You began to pound desperately on the fleshy walls of the prison.

Meanwhile Kyle was simply enjoying the feeling of your tiny struggles within his fist. Before any of this happened, it was always Kyle who was the one being restrained. He remembered all the times when you two used to wrestle. He hated how you were always easily able to force him to say uncle before letting him go. No matter how hard he tried to fight back, you were always bigger and stronger than him. But now...

Kyle stared down at his fist and giggled as he tightened it a little, causing your movements to weaken.

You continued pounding over and over again, crying out in desperation as the walls closed in further. The space within Kyle's hand was beginning to get clammy as sweat started to form on the walls of his palm. You began feeling yourself running out of steam as the heat became more and more intense.

"Kyle!!...let me out of here!....let me........"


On the outside, Kyle was mulling over his thoughts.


“Hehe, THIS is fun~” He stated excitedly

He knew that if he wanted to, he could keep you like this until your parents got back.

Then again....why let the fun stop there? Why should he let you return back to normal at all? It would serve you right for being such a mean jerk!

“Woahhh.... I bet I could have his room!...' Kyle began to daydream.

The boy eventually returned his attention back to his fist. There was a look in his eyes that seemed to suggest he had made up his mind.

-------

Just as you felt like you were going to pass-out from heat exhaustion, Kyle finally opened his hand.

You took a deep breath, trying to recover from the brutal heat box of your brother's fist.

“Okaaaay, you win, I'll let you see the robooot~” Kyle whined as he rolled his eyes.

Slowly he lowered you down to the carpet below about six inches away from the device.

You sighed with relief. Apparently your brother was done having fun. As you began to hurry over to the device, you began to wonder if you should be easy on him once you return back to normal...

You didn't get much time to think on the matter further, as a dark, ominous shadow suddenly settled over the device.

Before you were able to figure out what was happening, it was already too late.

One of Kyle's giant socked feet suddenly came down from nowhere and planted itself onto the device.

“Hehe, Say bye bye to mr. robot!~~" Kyle giggled as he began to apply pressure to the device.

Your heart skipped a beat. A strong wave of dread coursed through your entire body.

“no...NO!.....STOP!.....KYLE! THAT ISN'T FUNNY!!" You yelled.

You ran over to the side of your brother's foot, frantically attempting to lift it off; Your effort was obviously futile. You just hoped that this was all just a cruel joke.

It wasn't...

An actual crunching sound began to emanate from beneath Kyle's foot. The sides of his mouth grew wider and wider as he watched your pointless attempts to stop him.

"K-kyle! I'm sorry! I promise I'll be a better big brother! Just please stop this!"

“Sorry, I don't WANT a big brother anymore~” Kyle declared in between his monstrous giggling.

The crunching got louder along with the increasing pressure until the underside of Kyle's foot was firmly pressing down against the carpet.

After a moment that seemed like an eternity, the foot finally lifted back up, unveiling a flattened, unrecognizable disk of metal and wires.

You fell to your knees in horror. .

Your machine was the only way to grow back. Without it, you'd be stuck this way, like cowering insect....forever...
111111111.title: Kyle's new 'toy'

1111111111.content:
“Wow~ I didn't even have to press down that hard! haha!” Kyle laughed as he observed your reaction from above.

You couldn't say anything. You were speechless. There were no words that could remedy this.

“Cool! Now I never gotta listen to you ever again!!” The boy muttered tauntingly. You could see him biting his lower lip with glee.

You couldn't believe this was happening. This had to be a nightmare.



“Aw, don't worry little guy! I'll save a place for you somewhere in my new room! You could be like one of my toys!!"

It felt like Kyle was staring right through you as his imagination bubbled wildly behind the scenes,

The more you stared back, the more you didn't want to. Kyle's eyes were now totally clouded over with power.

It was at that moment that you realized you were trembling. You tried to stop it, but you couldn't. You were afraid. Broken and afraid.

("If I would have just acknowledged him earlier, I would have never ended up in this horrible situation'') You thought to yourself regrettably.

“Haha yeah!! You're just like a little toy!!!” Kyle continued to laugh as he leaned down and began to reach for you.


Kyle clearly wasn't settled with just keeping you tiny. Now he was actually claiming his dominion over you – It was something that the boy had probably always dreamed about.

Once again, you were absolutely powerless as your 'little' brother trapped you in his grasp.
1111111111.title: Why?

11111111111.content:
Kyle carried you up to his face on his palm.

He snickered as he pushed you over with one of his fingers, smiling over the fact that there was hardly any resistance.

You attempt to get back up, only to be pushed down again. Kyle was now pinning you down against his palm.

"Go ahead! try and lift my finger!" the boy continued to taunt.

You tried to push back with all your might, but It was impossible.
11111111111.title: No worries

111111111111.content:
"I guess I could give you a new name if I wanted to'' He said while lost in thought

("He's going to take away everything")

"Hmm, well, when I first saw you on the carpet, I thought you were a bug...so.."

Kyle brought his hand right up to his face

"Alright 'bug', maybe we should start our first game" His eyes gleaming with dominance.

The thought of playing any 'game' at your size would be disastrous. Despite everything you've gone through, your instinctual will to survive was still strong.

Kyle looked around the room as his mind continued to think of things to do with you.

"Well, I guess I need a good place to hide you while I'm not around" he spoke out loud.

"It definitely won't be in here..." he looked around your room.

With that, he began to walk towards the exit.

Kyle continued on his way out of the room. He hummed to himself while swinging his hand back and forth. The sound of his socked feet thumping against the hallway floor.
111111111111.title: Change of scenery

1111111111111.content:
"Lets see now" he scanned the room

Kyle's room was assorted with much of what you would expect to be in an nine year old boy's room. Light blue walls, a wooden floor, a shelf that held his action figures. He had a small tv with a video game console. Playing cards scatted across the floor along with a remote controlled RV car. He had a skateboard that was leaned against his closet door, and cartoon character sheets and pillows across his bed.

Kyle began to walk towards his dresser.

He stared at his empty hamster cage for a moment.

"I can't put you in here because, mom and dad might see you.."

His eyes began to lower towards his opened sock drawer

A smile formed on his face as he placed you on the large dresser

"Hey bug! I found you a new home" he said as his hands began to fish through the drawer. You watched with dread as he pulled out one of his old socks.

He began to reach towards you with his other hand. You knew from past experience that there was no avoiding him.

You could do nothing but squirm as he brought you directly over the opening to his sock.

Though it had been washed, it was still rather old. You could smell all the months of use emanating from the opening.

"Have fun!" Kyle said brightly as he dropped you.
1111111111111.title: New home

11111111111111.content:
You’ve never experienced the feeling of free-falling. The entire world whizzed past you as you entered the white abyss. As you made your descent, you knocked into one of the sides, causing you to tumble violently through the air until you hit bottom face-first with an abrupt stop.

You began rubbing your forehead as you were trying to recover from the dizziness.

Standing up, you started surveying your surroundings. You could tell by the grey fabric around you that you were sitting in the toe-section.

High up above you could see one of Kyle’s eyes staring down at you.

“How is it?” He giggled

Kyle was on cloud 9. He never in his wildest dreams imagined that he would be watching his big brother struggling to stand at the bottom of one of his socks. You were just so puny and fragile. Down below, Kyle's toes were flexing into the carpet as he imagined what it would feel like to put the sock on with you still inside. It was during this fantasy that Kyle started to have that wonderful feeling again. It wasn't one that he was completely sure how to describe. His heart began to beat faster and he was becoming somewhat light-headed. He didn't really know why, but it made him feel really good all over. The only thing he knew is that he wanted to feel more of it.
11111111111111.title: The sock

111111111111111.content:
He decided that he would explore these feelings later as he left the sock hanging over the side of his chair. Kyle found that he was a little hungry, but since it was supposed to be YOUR job to feed him....

“I hope you don’t mind if I take a few dollars out of your old wallet” He chuckled knowing that you had no say in the matter.

CONTACT

A huge flash spread from the red orb that enveloped the entire room. You raised your hands to shield your vision while Kyle closed his eyes all together.

The light was so bright that your eyes had to recover for a moment.

The first thing you immediately noticed was that you felt almost paralyzed. For some reason you could no longer move your arms or legs. It isn't long before you realize that you can't use any of your muscles at all.

"A... am I really paralyzed?" You think to yourself how tragic this is. The idea of being bound to a wheel chair, drinking food from a tube. You were terrified.

You then notice the mirror across the room

Reflecting back at you, positioned on the exact platform that you were now on top of.....was the apple.

"I TURNED INTO AN APPLE?!?"

"how can I even see?" you ponder to yourself as you continue your attempts to move.

You couldn't even budge a centimeter.

You're suddenly filled with optimism. You remember that in your calculations you deduced that the effects of the static pulse would revert the object's properties back it's original form as long as the subject remains under the radiation of the red bulb after a solid three minutes.

You sigh to yourself, almost having lost all hope.

"Well, I guess I just need to play the waiting gam--"

Your thought process is interrupted when you notice your little brother burst out from the pillows on your bed.

"K-KYLE?! What are you doing here!?!" you attempted to shout, which was impossible without a mouth or respiratory system.

You could only watch as he got out of bed and looked around the room.

Just as you were finishing your thought, Your kid-brother's eyes made contact with you.

You were shocked "Could there be something that happened to the apple's appearance that allows him to realize it's me?" You wonder as he steps closer.

"Don't worry Kyle, one more minute and I'll..-"

You were forced to stop again as you noticed your brother was now reaching for you

"Wait... KYLE WHAT ARE YOU DOING? WAIT HEY!"

You shout at the top of your non-existent lungs as your little brother's massive hand (from the perspective of an apple) gets closer.

"NO!!!! KYLE STOP! DON'T TOUCH ME! I NEED TO STAY HERE! KYYLEEEE!! STOOOOP!" you cried internally.

As your your brother's fingers began to wrap around you, your mind was in turmoil. The moment he moves you, you'll never be able to revert back.

"KYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYLLLLLLLLLE!!!" you made one last final scream as Kyle carelessly pulls you out from the machine without a thought in the world.

There you were, in the palm of your 10 year old brother's hand. An apple. You couldn't believe this.

You stared up at his smiling face as he began to examine you.

Your whole being was filled with regret. You'd never be a human ever again. Your mind was so busy processing the anguish of your situation that hadn't noticed your brother was making an odd face.

It was an expression that made you uneasy. It was almost like a look of anticipation.....no...that's not the word.

With a sudden movement, Kyle lowered his arm and began to rub you against his shirt.

"Wait, what is he doing?!"

It was your job to make lunch for him.

He must have saw the apple and thought it was for .......

Your eyes shift to Kyle just in time to see his tongue trace across the outside of his lips.

"N-...no.!.." you can only watch with dread as he lifts you up to his face.

You now understood that the look in his eyes was hunger.

You scream in terror as you're now faced with your brother's open mouth.


"KYYYYLEEEE!!!!! STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOP!!----"


CHOMP

Though you didn't feel anything, it was as if a slice of your existence faded. Almost as if Kyle actually took a bite out of your life-force.

CHOMP

There was nothing you could do. It was bite after indulgent bite.

CHOMP
CHOMP
CHOMP

After each chomp he would chew and emit a loud wet gulp from the back of his throat.

Kyle must have been very hungry, for only a kid, he managed to take care of the apple in nearly two minutes.

By the time there was only a core left, your existence had been entirely consumed.

Kyle let out a small belch of satisfaction as he threw the core away into the waste bin. Completely unaware that if he had just waited another minute, his brother would have been able to return to his human form.

You lifted your arms up to you face and noticed you no longer had hands, just furry brown arms. Continuing to look over yourself in horror, you notice that the rest of your body was covered with the exact same type of brown fur. "no.... I'm.... I can't be.."

Right as you were in the middle of reflecting on this crisis, you suddenly felt a pair of enormous hands grab you from both of your sides.

"W-wh!?!" Slowly lifted up into the air against your will, you can only watch as you travel up the front of Kyle's shirt until you reach his massive boyish face. His expression could only be described as total wonderment.
1131.title: Soft and fuzzy.

11311.content:
"I-Is that really you?" Kyle stared at the stuffed animal in total awe.

"WHAT DID YOU DO?! YOU TOUCHED MY DEVICE DIDN'T YOU?! KYYYYLLE!" Though you were struggling with all your might, your little brother didn't seem to have any problem holding on to you.

"It really IS you!!!!" Kyle shouted with an open-mouthed smile, almost as if completely ignoring you.

"Woooow, you really turned into a teddy bear!" The boy began to examine you with total amusement, lifting your arms and legs and turning you around in his hands.

"H-hey! stop! I didn't say you could do that!!" Kyle stopped the moment he picked up on the seriousness of your tone. He knew that you'd punish him pretty bad if he kept going.

"Errr...sorry, I kinda got carried away" Kyle spoke apologetically with a nervous smile. There was always a point that Kyle knew never to cross. Being a little brother, it was only common to be raised with that sense of sub-servitude.

"You realize I'm going to take your DS away because of this.." You threatened

"Awww! Common Brandon! It was just a joke! I didn't mean for this to happen!" The boy whined like child normally would after being told his/her punishment. Luckily, you've been using threats to manipulate the Kyle for years. You've practically become a master at getting him to do whatever you desired from him.

"Alright alright, I'll let you go this time, but you need to do exactly what I say alright?"

"Yeah yeah! I promise!" The boy was now totally eager to obey.

"Alright, so I'm guessing that this had something to do with my device's mass-compound trilicitory bulb. I honestly never imagined that it had transformative properties. THANKFULLY, I should be able to turn back as long as I'm under direct contact with the bulb's radiation for a good twenty minutes. That should give the transpicative layers of trasforto enough time matter to reverse the process and return me to my original form. If I miss this recovery period, I'll probably need to wait an entire day for the machine to charge up again...still.."

At some point during your scientific mumbo-jumbo Kyle's attention started to waver. He absentmindedly began to stroke the left side of your belly with his right thumb. A light affectionate blush forming across his face.

"KYLE!! Are you even listening?!" You shout as you start to notice how distant his gaze was.

"W-w-what?! Yeah ! I was listening!" The boy came back to reality frantically. You let out a groan of annoyance.

"Look, just because i'm a stuffed animal doesn't mean you can just ...*ramble...*ramble*....*ramble*

Kyle's attention started to once again waver after you said "I'm a stuffed animal" .....
11311.title: Teddy brother

113111.content:
"Alright, so that's what I need you to do, got it?" You had just finished going through all the steps Kyle needed to take in order to bring you back to normal.

"uhh...wait..umm.. can you explain it again?" Kyle had been daydreaming again. A part of you would do anything just to be able to reach over and choke the kid.

"LOOK. All you need to do is pick up the device, place it on that stool and pull it up to the side of the bed. Alright?"

"oh! That's easy!" the boy stood up, leaving you on the floor. Seeing him stand up at full height was kind of intimidating from your point of view. His long-human legs carried him all the way across the rooms in only a few steps. Doing as he was told, Kyle lifted the device and placed it on the chair, rolling it right up against the side of the bed.

"Now what?" The boy asked as he leaned over to pick you up. The speed of being lifted so quickly made you dizzy.

Kyle couldn't help but feel a warm fuzzy feeling every time he held you. You were just so small and cute looking to him. He kept finding himself resisting the urge to pull you into a tight hug.

"s-so now what?" Kyle muttered, trying to get his mind off of how cuddly your form looked.

"Alright place me down on the bed next to the chair and push these buttons in exact order, ready?"

Kyle placed you down in front of the machine, preparing himself to press a few of the multi-colored buttons on it's base.

"Green, blue, Red, green, 1342872, Red, orange, blue, yellow"

Kyle pressed the buttons in the exact order that you instructed. Almost immediately, the red bulb in front of you started to shine with an almost other-worldly aura.

"Alright, that should do" You continue to sit there, basking in the bulb's warm radiation. All you needed to do now was sit there for another twenty minutes. Luckily you still had another two hours before you would have to wait an entire day before attempting to revert the transformation again. You shutter to yourself as you imagine being stuck in this form for a 24 hours.

"Now what?" Kyle spoke as he laid down on the bed two feet away from you.

"Now we wait"

"How long?"

"Twenty minutes"

"oh.."

It only took five minutes for Kyle to become bored. He started to make weird noises with his mouth to pass the time. Three minutes later he had fallen asleep. You sighed in relief now that you no longer had to listen to any of his obnoxious noises.

Time continued to flow buy until you only had five minutes to go. You started to imagine all the delicious pay-back you'd put Kyle through. Maybe you'd lock him in a dark closet for a few minutes or something.

As you were contemplating your revenge, Kyle was deep into sleep. He'd occasionally whimper and fidget as he adventured through dream land.

"Mmmm Bran...don.... teddy.. so..cuuute" You weren't paying attention, but Kyle was likely dreaming about you as a teddy bear. Kyle continued to fidget as his arms twitched up and down in front of him. Accidentally making contact with your fuzzy form, the boy subconsciously began reaching for you.

"W-wha ! HEY!!" You wriggle in surprise as you find yourself being pulled backwards.

"K-KYLE! What are you doing?!" Kyle had always been a heavy sleeper, there were times when you had to spray him with water just to get him up. You continued to struggle as the nine year old pulled up into a tight embrace against his chest.

"Mmmmm~ So .....soft~ Brandon...." A smile formed across Kyle's mouth as he rubbed his face into you affectionately.

"KYLE!! LET. GO. OF. ME. I NEED TO GET BACK TO THE BULB!!! KYLE!!!" The boy rolled over to the other side of the bed, pinning you under him as held onto you tightly. Your muffled cries simply couldn't reach him.
113111.title: 'Brotherly' relationship?

1131111.content:
[Three hours later]

"MMmmmnyaaahh!!!" *Yawwwwn* Kyle stretched his legs, feet, and toes as he started to awaken.

"Mmmm~ Ahhh~" A bit of drool had formed across the boy's cheek which he absentmindedly wiped across the furry surface next to his face.

Still a bit drowsy, the Kyle started to open his eyes lazily. Almost immediately, he started noticed the sound of muffled whimpers coming within his arms.

"....huh?... Brandon?" He loosened his hold on you, causing you to roll off of him. Though you weren't producing any tears, it was now clear to him that you were upset.

"W-..what's wrong?" Kyle asked worryingly.

"You idiot..... YOU STUPID IDIOT!"

"What did I do? W-what time is it?" Kyle didn't realize that TIME was exactly the problem. By accidentally holding his brother captive, he caused him to miss the recovery period necessary to change back.

"I'M GOING TO BE STUCK LIKE THIS ALL DAY NOW BECAUSE OF YOU!!!" You yelled in rage.

"I-I I'm sorry! I didn't mean to!" Kyle knew he was in big trouble now. There wasn't any way you were going to let him get away with this.

"P-please don't take my DS away! I'll do anything!!"

You couldn't believe it. He was more concerned with his DS than with what he had just caused.

"YOU IDIOT! DON'T YOU GET IT?! YOU THINK THAT I CAN TAKE AWAY ANYTHING LIKE THIS?! I'M A FUCKING TEDDY BEAR!!" You shouted totally unfiltered.

Your words had to process in Kyle's mind. Your message had reached him, but he was having trouble trying to understand why he wasn't going to get his DS taken away. The idea of NOT getting in trouble just seemed to be impossible for him to compute.

That was when your last words finally registered to him. "I'm a fucking teddy bear"

Kyle's eyes brightened with realization. Of course you couldn't punish him. How could you? You couldn't turn back now to punish him now. For the time being...you were a teddy bear.

Though it took him a little while, Kyle was finally grasping the implications of your transformation. Kyle was now thinking outside of the boundaries of the norm. You had always punished him when he did something wrong. It had always been a standard rule in his life that if he messed with you, he'd pay the price. But now...
Now you couldn't do anything. You were a fuzzy little stuffed animal. Sure you could threaten him, but you no longer had the physical means to back it up. Though he was still worried, he couldn't help but feel a sense of relief knowing that you no longer had the power to discipline him.

Meanwhile, during all of Kyle's inner thoughts, you were still raging. That was when you noticed that Kyle had a sense of relief on his face.

"WHAT......WHY DO YOU LOOK SO HAPPY???"

This caused Kyle to snap out of it. "Oh...uh.. no reason...really.."

"ah man, I'm going to beat the crap out of you" You whispered in blind anger.
...
..

"...but...you can't though.." Kyle muttered quietly.

...
"What did you just say...?" You glared at him intensely through your button eyes.

"Not right now.. I mean...." Kyle was trying his hardest to hide his inner smile. Something about pointing out the obvious truth of situation delighted him. He still felt bad about his brother, but it was the first time he could openly say that you were in no position to back up your threat.

You were so angry that you felt yourself trembling. Did this brat just down-talk you? Now, after everything his actions have caused you? Wasn't he even sorry?

It was almost as if you didn't fully realize that you were charging at him until you were half way there. You jumped into his lap and started to violently pumble his abdomen with your plushie arms.

Up above Kyle simply watched in fascination. He could tell that you were trying your hardest, but none of your blows were even close to being viewed as harmful. It simply felt he was being lightly tapped with teabags.

Much like the situation earlier, Kyle brought his hands around you and lifted you up to his face.

"GRRRGGHHH!!! LET. ME. FUCKING. GO!!"
..
..
..
..

Kyle stared at you intently as the gears in his brain slowly turned.

113111112.content:
Kyle looks at you and says, "If I turn you back, you'll take my DS away and be mean to me."

You correct him and say, "I'm taking your DS away because you messed with my stuff."

"You can't take my DS away as long as you stay a teddy bear."

You begin to speak but then you finally understand. You are expecting a ten year old to understand at a teenage level. As you think about it, your anger fades. Kyle still needs to learn to quit messing with your stuff but your anger is only scaring him, not teaching him. You need to try a gentler approach.

You hug Kyle. "I'm sorry for yelling at you. I'm not going to be mean to you anymore and I'm not going to take your DS away. I'm sorry if I was mean in the past."

Kyle is pleased that the teddy bear is hugging him back. Kyle is still confused that you aren't taking his DS away. "But I messed with your machine. Aren't you going to pay me back?"

"It was wrong of you to mess with my machine but I overreacted."

"What does over-re-ac-ted mean?"

You laugh. Kyle is puzzled by your laugh. You say, "whoa-boy" and sigh. It is frustrating trying to explain things to a ten year old.

"I felt frustrated but I shouldn't have taken it out on you. I should have known better than to expect you to keep your curiosity under control. I should have taken care of you like Mom and Dad expected me too. I'm the one who did wrong."

Kyle only understands that last part. "Do you need a spanking?"

You start to protest but Kyle spanks you before you get the words out. However, your big plushie ass doesn't feel any pain, a combination of Kyle not hitting with his full strength and your over-stuffed ass deflecting the blow. Kyle was still just being playful, not mean or angry. You decide to just let the playful spanking go.

"Will you help me get back to normal?"

Kyle says, "I don't know how."

You think for a while. You have to wait a day before you can do anything anyway. Even then, how much help can you expect from Kyle? You might get him to follow simple instructions but you can't expect him to wait patiently. You need to think your plans through and quit being so quick to act.

In the meantime, Mom and Dad will probably call sometime today. How are you going to explain being a teddy bear?

Kyle is still hugging you. You realize this feels good. You still have some control over your brother even though you lost the size advantage. If you play it right, this might not turn out to be that bad of a day.

1131111122.content:
Kyle didn't want to let you go. In fact, his hugging you had taken on an almost desperate dimension as if he thought if he kept you close, he could ward off any consequences for his earlier actions.

Considering some of his earlier questionable decisions, the hugging wasn't so bad. In fact, it felt rather good and helped relieve some of the stress his brother felt about the anticipated phone call from Mom and Dad. How would he explain being a teddy bear? "Mom and dad, there's been an accident, but I still have all my stuffing?"

He'd need to do better than that.

In the meantime, if it put him in a good mood, Kyle could hug you all he wanted. You didn't want to release all control over your brother. It was bad enough you had lost the size advantage. This might not turn out to be that bad of a day.

In the late afternoon, the phone rang. "Brandon, it's them!" Kyle exclaimed after screening the number.

Brandon had tried to prepare. "Hold the phone up to my face," he instructed Kyle since he lacked any fingers or thumbs.

Mom spoke first, and her eldest son could tell she was worried about them. "We're fine, mom," Brandon spoke in a gruff voice. His throat had felt fine earlier.

"Brandon, what are you doing?" Kyle worried. "Speak like yourself!"

Brandon watched Kyle, in his frustration, whip the phone away from his face.

"Sure, put dad on the phone," Brandon yelled louder until Kyle rectified his mistake and brought the phone closer again.

Dad simply repeated mom's questions and thanked Brandon for doing a good job. "We knew you have a good head on your shoulders," his father said.

Brandon wanted to groan. "If you only knew," he thought to himself as he sat atop the kitchen table, a talking teddy bear.

Then Dad dropped the boom on them. "We've decided to extend our trip a couple of days," he said. "You guys can manage, right?"

Brandon locked his button eyes on his brother's pensive eyes. Kyle nodded, so Brandon gave their father an affirmative answer. "Have a nice trip, Dad. Tell Mom we love her."

Then, the phone call ended.

"Whew, that went well," Kyle said with a boyish giggle. "I don't think they ever suspected you're a teddy bear."

"You think?" Brandon snapped in a rough voice.

"But why do you keep trying to sound like a teddy bear?"

Brandon worried. "I'm not trying," he said. "My voice...it's changing."

"Well, it's not that bad," Kyle said.

"I'm just glad I can change back in a few more hours."

"Yea," Kyle said weakly, not at all convincing.

"Kyle, you are still going to help me change back?" Brandon's gruff voice grew shrill from worry.

"Sure, but Mom and Dad aren't coming home as soon, so I thought..."

"You thought what? That you could keep me as your teddy bear?" Brandon shook his foam-filled head.

"Just a couple more days," he pleaded.

"No way!"

"Please!"

"No!" Brandon felt exasperated again. "I can change back tonight when the device has re-charged. And that's that!"

Kyle frowned and grabbed his brother off the table. Hugging him tightly, the boy said, "Well, I will just have to have the most fun I can with you until then!"

11311111221.content:
After an intense cuddling session with his teddy brother, Kyle took him by the paw and carried him over to the fridge. The boy's stomach growled hungrily as he looked for a potential snack.

Brandon felt intense embarrassment at finding himself dangling helplessly from his little brother's hand. He tried to speak but found his speech slurred and words difficult to form.

"Kyle... can...can...you..." He tried to shake his head, but found that his neck felt stiff and didn't want to move in response to his mental commands. Frightened, he tried again. "Put...sit me...on the table."

Grabbing a tube of Go-Gurt from the fridge, Kyle looked down at his teddy brother. "Sure thing, Brandon."

Go-Gurt in one hand with his brother dangling in the other, Kyle walked to the table, took a seat, and placed the teddy bear on the table in front of him.

"Ky...Kyle...something...is...wrong..."

Kyle opened the tube and squeezed the tasty yogurt directly into his mouth. "What do you mean?"

"It...it...is getting harder...to speak..." Brandon said as he felt his body stiffen. His flexible teddy bear limbs felt like they had locked into place.

Kyle enjoyed another squeeze of the yogurt and swallowed. "So?"

"I...I think the trans- the transform--- transformation --- is still progressing."

"You mean you might become a real teddy bear?"

Brandon disliked the hopeful note in the boy's question.

"Let's... let's go over... what you will need to do ... tonight to ... change me back," Brandon said, fearful of losing the ability to communicate.

Kyle shrugged and finished the Go-Gurt. "OK."

"Please...you may have... have to work the machine..."

"That's cool," Kyle said. "I believe I can handle your little machine."

Brandon worried more. "KY..." He could not push his brother's name out of his cloth patch of a mouth. "KY...ky...ky..."

His voice grew gruff and faded. He felt a shock of terror when he tried again and found he could no longer make a sound.

"Did it happen?" Kyle looked at him curiously. "Brandon?"

In his mind, Brandon screamed at his brother, but he made no noise whatsoever. His fate now rested completely in Kyle's hands.

Kyle smiled and did not look nearly as concerned about the situation as Brandon would have liked.

"I will take good care of you, teddy bro," the boy promised and picked the mute teddy bear off the table.
