113111112211.content:
Kyle ran off to play for a while and since Brandon stopped talking, Kyle got bored and started watching tv again. Then he fell asleep. The time to restore Brandon came and passed. In fact, Kyle was technically staying up passed his bed time. He had fallen asleep but wasn't actually in bed.

The next morning, Kyle woke up and started looking for people, "Mom, Dad, anyone home?"

He changed the channel and watched for a bit but started to get hungry. So he went to the kitchen and attempted to make a bowl of cereal. He succeeded but he made a big mess too and forgot to put the milk back in the fridge.

He didn't think about Brandon. He forgot that his parents were away and Brandon was supposed to be looking after him. He forgot that Brandon had been turned into the teddy bear he was now carrying around with him.

Brandon however was completely aware of all of this. He tried to scream and get Kyle's attention but he couldn't speak anymore. He couldn't move anymore either.
113111112211.title: Forgotten but not gone

113111112212.content:
They got from the kitchen to the living room when Kyle's phone buzzed. Dropping his teddy brother on the sofa, Kyle answered the phone, excited to get a call from his best friend, Tommy.

He listened, muttering "yes" and "probably" and one very excited "that sounds fantastic," before the call ended and he looked down at the motionless teddy bear at rest on the sofa.

"That was Tommy," Kyle said by way of explanation. "He's got a new game he wants me to try out with him."

Brandon wanted to put his foot down, but he couldn't move any of his fingerless paws. "But we have to run the restoration program in a few hours," he tried to say, but the paralysis that had shut down his speech and movement continued.

"It'll just be a few hours," Kyle said, feeling a little guilty, but not enough to stay home and look after a boring teddy bear. Brandon had been a lot cooler when he could move and talk.

"At least take me with you!" Brandon tried to scream. He did not want to stay alone for hours, trapped in the form of a mute teddy bear.

Kyle turned on the television and made sure that Brandon faced the screen. "There you go," he said. "You can watch television and I'll be back in no time."

Brandon felt his brother's hands placed him against the back of the sofa and turn him to the screen. Of course, the viewing preferences of the brothers differed. Kyle had selected cartoon programming that, in Brandon's opinion, shouldn't even appeal to a five-year-old.

"Oh god! Not this! At least change the channel!"

He looked up and saw that Kyle had already headed toward the front door, leaving Brandon on his home.

About an hour of torment later, the door opened and...
113111112212.title: A friend call Kyle and invites him to his house

choices: Brandon doesn't attract any buyers and gets tossed into the trash
1131111122123.content:
His mother walked through the front door, focused exclusively on the task at hand. She needed to gather the items for the women's club bazaar that she had forgotten to select before leaving on her trip.

She placed her purse on the kitchen table and then began to walk through her house, selecting items to donate to the bazaar and also getting rid of some of the clutter that naturally accumulates in any home.

She placed into a cardboard box a set of canisters, a superfluous corkscrew, and the hideous set of drink coasters that her mother-in-law had gotten her at Christmas. She walked through the living room on her way upstairs and spied the bear.

Brandon rejoiced when his mom slowed to a stop and actually noticed him. Had she somehow heard his desperate screams? He had been yelling wordlessly since she returned.

Her son tried to communicate a plea one more time. "Mom! Please, help me. Kyle screwed with my machine and I'm a teddy bear!"

"That looks like Brandon's old bear," she said and picked him up.

"Mom! It's me!"

"It's still in pretty good shape," she said. Brandon was far too old for stuffed animals, and he never ever showed any trace of sentiment. "He will never know it's gone," she said and deposited the bear into the box with the other items.

"Mom!" Brandon panicked when she put him in the box.

She ignored him and went upstairs to search for more items. She returned with a wristwatch-style Fitbit and a package of bath oils and lotions. The items went into the box with the stuffed bear and other things she had collected.

"Mom! Can't you hear me!"

Picking up the box, she looked at the clock on the wall. She had plenty of time to reach the community center in time for the sale. She scooped the box into her arms and headed back to her car.
1131111122123.title: Mom on a Mission

11311112.content:
It was the first time he had ever been able to disobey his older brother without having to worry. He never realized that saying such a simple word could be so exciting.

"If you don't put me down right no-"

"Hmm??" Kyle smiled as he brought you closer to his face.

You didn't like this. Kyle was no longer showing you respect. Without the power to assert your authority, your command over him was dwindling. You wished that there was something you could say to trick him, but Kyle seems to has already evolved passed that point.

"...."

"What? weren't you going to say something?" The boy smirked. He knew that he was being kinda mean, but it wasn't any different from the way you used to do to him on a daily basis. Surely, he deserved a turn at being in charge. Besides, it's not like you would remain this way forever...or anything..........

Curious to experiment, Kyle starts to think for a moment. That's when he comes up with an idea.

Putting you down for a moment, Kyle reaches over and pulls off his left sock, tossing it across the room. You stare at him suspiciously, trying to figure out what he was planning.

"Hey Brandon, um... would you mind getting that?"

"W-what? uh.. no?"

"(hmm.. maybe I need to be a little meaner...)" Kyle thought to himself.

He reaches over and grabs you by the arm, pulling you into the air. "Go get my sock!"

"HEY!! Let go!" Kyle's heart skipped a beat for a moment after hearing your plea. For some reason, treating you this way was kinda fun.

Laying his eyes on your machine, Kyle started to formulate.

"What would happen if I 'accidentally' broke that red thing?"

"w-what red th-....." You could feel your chest tighten as you realized he was talking about your device.

There was no way. He had to be bluffing. Kyle knew very well that you needed that device to turn back.

"Oh please..." You mutter nervously.

Kyle started to reach over, preparing to flick the bulb with his index finger.

"w...wait ....S-STOP!!"

Kyle turns to you, giving you a boyish grin. ("bingo")

"A-alright..." You stand up and jump off the bed towards the corner of the room. As you make your way back you realize that the bed is too high for you to climb. You call Kyle's name.

"Aw, too high for the little teddy?" Kyle was thoroughly enjoying himself. He was never allowed to be this mean before. The more he gave into it, the more enjoyable it became.

You feel yourself pulled back up onto the surface of the bed, Kyle's sock loosely held between your two plushie arms.

"Aw, good job Brandon. Now put it back on." He propped his foot up next to you. It was only a few inches shorter than you were.

Fearing that Kyle might actually go through with his threat, you begin to pull the white fabric over his toes, bringing it down to his heel.

Kyle couldn't believe it, he was actually able to order you around! He couldn't describe it in words, but the new-found power he felt made him feel all tingly. Over the next day Kyle continued to make demands; each more humiliating than the last.

He made you dance for him, he started calling you 'Toby' (which was the teddy's original name), he even sat on you until you begged. Though Kyle was only having some fun, he couldn't deny how excited it made him to treat you as if you were just any old stuffed animal. After a while, the way he was dehumanizing you was beginning to set in. That night, Kyle slept with you in bed like he had done before. Though the entire situation was unsettling, you couldn't deny the comforting warmth you received as you were smothered into the boy's chest.

There was really nothing you could do but grit your non-existent teeth. You didn't want Kyle to act hasty and cause any irreversible damage to the machine. All you had to do was wait a little longer. Your parents would come home soon, which meant that Kyle's power-trip was limited.
11311112.title: Kyle kinda enjoys this (cruel)

113111121.content:
By the next day, the machine was ready for use. Your parents would be home in an hour.

Kyle was tossing you up into the air over and over again, clearly deep in thought.

"OKAY. ENOUGH!" You shouted, causing the boy to snap out of his trance and drop you onto the bed next to him.

"Mom and dad are going to be home soon, we need to turn me back now!" You shuffled your way towards the side of the bed where the device sat. As you were about half way there, you felt one of your arms being held back. Turning around, you faced Kyle who looked upset.

"Kyle...I know. You had your fun, but now things need to go back now. Play time is over. What do you think mom would think if they found that I'm a talking teddy bear? Huh Kyle? What are they going to do when I tell them everything you just did to me? ... Look, I promise I won't take your DS away alright?"

Kyle was no longer thinking about things like that anymore. He was more concerned with things going back to the way they were before.

The boy's heart was racing. He knew all along that time was running short. The more time he spent with you as a teddy bear, the more he realized how much nicer things were then when you were normal. Once you changed back, he knew that you'd make him pay for all the humiliating things he made you do. Not only that, but he'd never be able to tell you what to do ever again. Kyle started to tremble, he was a scared kid; scared of becoming the 'little' brother again. He was thinking desperately for anything that could be done to keep things this way. ANYTHING.

"COME ON KYLE. LET. ME. GO!" You continued your attempts to escape his firm grasp. You were completely unaware of the horrifyingly selfish thoughts starting to race through Kyle's mind. It had never occurred to you that he would ever consider putting his enjoyment before you.

("M-maybe if I hid him in my toy trunk...")("No.. they'd still be able to hear him..)

He probably wasn't even considering how worried your parents would be. His only concern was ending his role as a little brother. It's very likely that Kyle didn't truly comprehend that what he was actually considering could be defined as kidnapping; Though, this shouldn't be too odd considering he's only 10 years old. It's not like boys that age rarely ever think things through to the end.

No matter how many scenarios Kyle tried to formulate in his head, there was no way he could keep things this way . Kyle could easily convince his parents that your movements are a new type of technology or something, but your voice was really the only thing that made you different from any other teddy.


"..... If only you couldn't ...talk.." Kyle whispered under his breath.

"Wait a minute..." Kyle spoke softly ..."How .......are you talking?"....

You yourself have been wondering this as well, but you didn't give it any real though.

Kyle's eyes widened "WAIT A MINUTE" The boy grabbed you, turning you around roughly. He had noticed a zipper on your back when he examined you earlier.

"K-KYle! HEY!"

The nine year old eagerly began to tug at the metal tag.

"H-HEY!! W-What are you DOING?!?" You struggled against his grip.

Pulling your back open, Kyle started to prod the insides of your stuffing. The feeling of his fingers inside you was incredibly uncomfortable, almost as if he was violating you.

Kyle gasped when his fingers made contact with something. Nestled deep inside the cotton was a small plastic audio device.

"[GET YOUR HANDS OUT OF THERE!]"

This was it, this was where your voice was coming from. With a twisted smirk on his face the boy reached in and started to tug on one of the tiny wires protruding from the device.

"K- Y ... LE. .W....HA......D...ING??" Your voice began to break up the tighter he pulled. Licking his lips with a child-like cruelty, he gave the wire one final tug, ripping it right out of the speaker. Loose ends of metallic wiring curled in loops, beyond repair.

"......"

"Teddy bears aren't supposed to talk.." Kyle grinned.
113111121.title: Getting worse

1131111211.content:
You screamed internally. "Did he really just do that?!"

The more Kyle tried to run away from his responsibility, the worse the situation became for you.

The boy was willing to hide the truth by any means possible, even if it meant silencing you.

Kyle pulled the zipper back up tightly and turned you around to face him.

"I liked it when Toby didn't talk" The boy grinned widely.

He had done it. He'd successfully silenced you. As long as he kept you in his room, there was practically no way you could contact your parents.

"I guess that means there's only one more thing to do!" Kyle beamed

Kyle reached past you and began to unscrew the trilicitory bulb from the device. Finally realizing that Kyle was now dead-set on keeping you this way, your frantically attempted to stop him. All your efforts proved pointless against the giant boy. Pulling the bulb completely out, Kyle lowered it to the floor and placed a hard-cover book over it. Firmly pressing his socked-foot on the book's cover, he slowly added more and more of his weight.

It was like watching a nightmare take place. Your only hope of ever returning back to normal was about to be crushed by your (once) little brother.

"Wow, this thing can hold a lot of wei-.." CRUNCH

Your heart seized.

Kyle turned to face you with the most cruel yet satisfied grin you've ever seen him make. The crunching noise didn't just signal the destruction of the bulb, it signaled the end of your humanity. You looked up at the towering boy now standing over you, his shadow blocking out the light above. You could tell by the way he was looking at you right now. You weren't his big brother anymore. You were his possession.

Even if you could speak, there wasn't anything you could say. There was no anger, only impending fear as you tried to back away from Kyle's frighteningly massive form.

Still grinning, Kyle reached for you, lifted you up, and pulled you into a tight hug. Pushing your head into his face, he gave you a nice long sniff.

"mmmmm~" This was your scent now, the scent of a stuffed animal. HIS stuffed animal.

His wish had come true.
1131111211.title: New perspective

11311112111.content:
[Around two days of playing and sleep-nuzzling later.]

You began to noice that your movements were becoming a little sluggish. This only continued to progress over the new next few days. Your parents hadn't even noticed you by the time you stopped moving all together. You figured it had something to do with how long you waited. The transformation was finalizing, syncing you completely to the inanimate bear.

[Another week later]

Kyle had begun to feeling regretful. The boy admitted to himself that he probably went a bit too far. He couldn't help it though. The idea of keeping you this way was too tempting to resist at the time. Now he realized how lonely it was to not have a brother to talk to. It was only now that he understood that his punishment would have only been temporary, but now, you had to live the rest of your life as an inanimate stuffed animal.

Still a little naive to how his brother was probably really feeling, he tried to make it up to you by smothering the toy with affection. Not having heard your voice for so long had caused him to project his own feelings onto the bear, much the same way a child would normally do with a regular stuffed animal. Every night he'd take the you to sleep with him, absentmindedly covering you with his drool as he slept.

He initially called you by your real name 'Brandon', but as days went on, he forgettably began calling you "Toby" every once in a while, until 'Brandon' became sort of a forgotten term.
11311112111.title: Becoming less human

113111121111.content:
Years eventually went by. Kyle was now a 15 year old. Though he still felt obligated to acknowledge you, it simply wasn't cool for a kid his age to be sleeping with a teddy. He began leaving you on one of his shelves and would tell you about his day when he remembered.

One day he had decided to bring a few friends over. Not wanting them to think he still played with stuffed animals, he quickly threw you into an old chest in the corner of the room. Weeks went by until he remembered having left you inside. Opening it up, he pulled the old looking bear from the darkness with a regretful look on his face.

"..uh...sorry..tob..uh..Brandon......."

.....

"Maybe he's not even aware anymore." The teen spoke out-loud.

Kyle didn't want to compound his regret by knowing that he just left his brother in a dark chest for weeks while he was still fully aware. He instead convinced himself that right then and there that his brother's existence from the bear had faded a long time ago. The stuffed animal in his hands was simply that, a stuffed animal.

With those simple sentiments, Kyle lowered the bear back into the dark box, closing the lid and locking it tight.

Kyle eventually grew into an adult. Had a wife. Bought a house. Had his own family. The trunk in his room had eventually been moved up into the addict of his mother's house where it sat and collected dust. One day their mother opened it to find the stuffed animal. She gave it a good clean and sent it as a gift to one of Kyle's children.

12r old Danny opened the gift to find the tattered old bear.

"uh, I'm a little old for teddy bears..." The young teen laughed at his grandmother's present.

"Here Spike! New chew toy!" He threw the bear at his Corgi who carried it back downstairs. Days went by as the dog chewed holes into the stuffed animal.

Kyle who was now in his 40's took notice when he found his dog humping away at the tattered stuffed animal. Not recognizing the bear in any way, he simply turned away and let the dog have it's fun.
113111121111.title: Your fate

choices: Kyle grows instantly and quickly, like the apple did!
The machine doesn't have any effect, and Kyle doesn't grow... at least for now
The orb misfires and grows something/someone else (you/someone outside/etc.)
114.content:
As soon as you press the button, a bright laser shoots out from the orb down towards the Apple, filling your entire vision for a moment. You shield your eyes instinctively, though you still can only see a bright white blur as you hear a loud WHOOOSH followed by a sudden THOOM, and then... silence. The machine goes silent, and the only noise you hear is your slightly-heavier-than-normal breathing.

You lower your hand and then blink repeatedly, then rub your eyes, trying to regain your sight. Things slowly start to come back into focus, but as they do you begin to question if your eyes are actually working right. What you're seeing in front of you can't be real, can it?

But it is. In front of you, having crushed the platform it was sitting on and having knocked over the orb (thankfully without any damage, it appeared), was an eight-foot-tall juicy red apple, nearly reaching the ceiling.

You gasp. "Th-that's not what was supposed to happen!" you say out loud in astonishment. "Did I miscalculate...?" Your voice trails off as you look down at the console of your machine. Something seemed off; the dials and levers weren't in the same place that you left them. But that could only happen if...

"Kyle!" you yell out in frustration. Of course your little brother had something to do with this. He'd been bothering you about the machine for what seemed like forever; he must've snuck into your room and screwed around with things while you were in the bathroom. Well, now he was going to pay. Turning towards the door, you storm off towards his room to find him. "What did you do to my machine?"

From his hiding place underneath your pillows, Kyle can barely hold in his excitement at all that he saw. No, it wasn't a robot like he had thought, but it was something better! Something that made things big! Ever since before he could remember, Kyle would always fantasize about being bigger than Brandon, bigger than his parents -- bigger than everyone! And now, here was a device that could make his fantasies come true!

He knew he didn't have a lot of time. As soon as he was sure you were out of the room, he rolled off the bed onto the floor and then jumped up to the machine. Everything seemed to be set the same as before. He moved around the console to ensure nothing else was closer to the orb than he was. Taking a deep breath, he pressed the green button, and the orb lit up brightly just as you walked back into the room, gasping at what you saw...
114.title: Opposite of Expected

choices: Yes, Kyle reaches for the orb again, wanting to be even bigger!
Yes, Kyle carries you downstairs to play with you some more
No, you manage to wiggle free and escape! But what now?
1141.content:
The flash didn't last long; just long enough for you to feel a sense of total panic as you realized your trouble making little brother had activated a serious and powerful piece of scientific equipment on his own. "Should have made the controls more complicated..." you wildly thought as you slammed the bedroom door behind you, moving into the room as strangely amplified giggles filled the room, your eyesight clearing just in time to see Kyle's head press tightly up against the ceiling. You gulped as a million thoughts went through your head.

"Oh my god it works on people!"

"Oh my GOD Kyle is huge!"

"Looks like the settings keep the growth even, even when the subjects base heights are wildly different."

"SHIT! What are Mom and Dad going to say?!"

"The possibilities for this thing go WAY beyond shrinking garbage and growing food!"

"I'm so, so, so DEAD!"

Kyle, meanwhile, seemed to have only one thing on his mind: curiosity. His wide eyes looked around the room in amazement, taking in ever detail of your room. "Everything looks so small..." he said in wonderment, bending over slightly, his large hands resting on his knees as he got a better look at your bed. His lips quirked up in the corners slightly, a mischievous thought running through his head. He stood back up to his full height, the crown of his head cracking a spot in the ceiling, plaster snowing down around him and turned around, sticking his butt out as he hovered over your bed. This act seemed to break into your paralyzing thought process, your legs moving as you yelled out, "Kyle! Wait! Don't--"

Kyle landed backwards with reckless abandon, his shorts covered rear hitting the bed with enough force to snap the legs clean in half, a horrible screeching and scratching noise erupting around the room as the bed legs ripped into the carpet and scratched the hardwood underneath. The mattress folded in half on either side of the giant kid, his giggles loudly filling the air as he ruined your bed merely by sitting down on it. The sheets and covers tangled and pulled free from the corners of the mattress, pillows flying everywhere. Kyle eagerly grabbed them all up and dropped them on his lap, smugly looking over at you as you slowly approached. "A few minutes ago these covered my whole body but now I'm too big!"

You gulped slightly. Kyle was obviously intensely aware of the power he had and how much things had shifted from his recent growth spurt. He wasn't any stronger looking but proportionally he had gained a ton of weight and strength; it probably wouldn't be wise to annoy him. "That's really cool and all Kyle but...play time is over, we need to get you down to normal size."

Kyle's smile disappeared so quickly it was like it had been slapped off. "No way! I'm not going back to being a shrimp you can just push around! Talk about dumb, what kid would go back to that?"

"This isn't a game Kyle! You NEED to turn back and if you don't--"

"If I don't, WHAT?" Kyle thundered, jumping to his feet, the bare appendages landing with enough force to shake the entire room, the windows vibrating from the force of his immature but powerful voice. "What are YOU going to do about it?"

"I'm...I'm going to make you!" You said gamely, thrusting your chest out in what you hoped was a show of authority.

Kyle chuckled darkly and put his hands on his hips. "Okay! Go ahead and make me then!"

You huffed slightly and pushed your sleeves up. "Alright, I will!"

You stepped forward, planting a firm socked foot between your brother's bare ones, trying not to notice how huge they looked compared to your own, and planted your palms on your brother's warm stomach. It felt so warm and...solid! More like a wall then like a human body. Planting your other foot slightly behind you, you pushed, pushed with all your might! Now you weren't exactly a tall guy for your age, standing at the lower end of five feet, but surely a difference of only a few feet shouldn't have put you at THIS much of a disadvantage? No matter how hard you pushed, Kyle not only didn't step back, he didn't budge a single inch! After a few embarrassing minutes you gave up, wrapping your hands around your brother's thick right wrist, tugging fruitlessly at it for a few more minutes until he lifted his arm into the air, carrying you up with it!

"Nice try "big" brother, but I don't think you can force me to do anything anymore." Kyle said with a grin, his lips curling over his teeth as he tried to suppress a giggle. "You feel really light too...like a toy!"

Before you could dwell on the indignity of being referred to as a toy, Kyle's thick arms wrapped around your body and pressed you tight against his own, your face smashed into his shirt, right above his heart. His suppressed giggles erupted out as he did this, his body shaking slightly, the beats of his heart and vibrations of his giggles rippling against you. Your nose was forced to inhale a combination of young male body and peanut butter, a smear of it still on his shirt from lunch. "Little baby brother, with no Mom or Dad to look after you." He cooed gently, rubbing the back of your head with a BIT too much force.

Your heart sank as you realized just how far away Sunday seemed now. A whole weekend, completely alone, with your giant of a little brother...could things get worse?
1141.title: Big Curiosity

choices: You reach your machine in time (to prevent Kyle).
Kyle reaches your machine before you do (Your new BIG brother).
11411.content:
As your now giant 10-year-old brother, Kyle, holds you close to his chest, your legs and feet dangle about two feet above the floor. Your feet just hang there in front of his legs, just above his knees. “This is SO humiliating. Thank goodness that nobody is here to see this.”, you think to yourself.

You get more annoyed at your brother. You yell at Kyle but your face is buried in his shirt and your mouth is muffled, “Kyle, put me down!” Kyle pretends to not be able to understand what you’re saying “What was that, ‘big’ brother?” and giggles at you some more, which only makes you more annoyed. “Kyle, I mean it! Put me down right now!”

Since Kyle is still standing at full height, you do your best to look down at the floor to see if dropping from this height would be safe. You can just see over his arms and you’re able to determine that he stands just a little over eight feet tall as the crown of his head is grinding into the ceiling, which is 8 feet above the floor. He continues talking down to you as if you were a toy and treating you like a baby. Then, Kyle looks back down over at your machine and another mischievous idea crosses through his mind. About a foot-and-a-half above your head, another mischievous smile spreads on Kyle’s face. “This is getting boring.”, said Kyle, once again his voice caused the windows to vibrate and shook the entire room a little. “I’ve got a much BETTER idea!”

Suddenly, Kyle lets go of you and you drop to the floor. You manage to land on your feet with a bit of thud. “Ugh!” You’re okay and you quickly regain your balance and stand up just as Kyle walks over to your machine again. You yell at Kyle again and order him to get away from the machine “Kyle, get away from my machine! We shouldn’t use it until I adjust the settings and run some tests on it to make sure that it’s adjusted to shrink you down to normal size again!” Upon hearing you yell that at him, Kyle gets an annoyed look on his face. Then he gets angry at you again at yells “I’m not going to let you turn me into a shrimp again! You’ll just make fun of me and bully me more!”

Now you’re angry with your brother and worried about what he’s going to do. “Kyle, you’re too big! If you make yourself any larger, you’ll wreck the house! There’s no telling what a second blast will do to you or how large it will make you!” You walk up to Kyle and tug on his shirt to try to distract him from using your machine, but he pushes you away with one hand and very little effort. You get knocked back four feet to the floor, the wind has been knocked out of you and your chest is slightly sore from the impact. Kyle stands at the controls of the machine, right near the orb, and just like he did the first time, he makes sure that no one and nothing else is closer to the machine than he is. As you sit up and catch your breath, you watch in horror as Kyle reaches for the activation button again. You yell “Kyle, no! Don’t do it! I’m sorry that I…” Kyle replies “Too late, ‘big’ brother.”, his voice shaking the entire room.

Once again, Kyle activates the machine. Just like the first time, as soon as Kyle pressed the button, a bright laser shot out from the orb directly towards him. The beam struck Kyle in the chest while filling your vision and the entire room with a blinding light blur for a moment. You quickly shield your eyes again with your hand, though you can still only see the bright white blur as you hear the machine make a familiar loud WHOOOSH followed by a sudden THOOM, and then... silence. The machine goes silent once again. This time, however, the entire house instantly begins to shake, the floor begins to creak, plaster powder and dust, and now large chunks of ceiling and wood start falling onto the floor. “This feels great!”, Kyle says with a lot of enthusiasm. You notice that his voice is even louder and more amplified than before. Powder and dust start to coat the entire room and you. You cough a few times, “Oh yes, things could definitely get a LOT worse. Mom and dad are going to kill me.” you think to yourself.

You watch helplessly in horror as Kyle quickly squats down in an attempt to avoid growing through the ceiling, but his efforts are instantly wasted as he continues to grow too big for the room. He grows to 10 feet tall in a matter of seconds. He continues growing so big that his proportionate size makes him too heavy for the second floor of the house to support his weight.

You immediately start covering up and protecting the machine to prevent it from getting damaged. In your panic, you consider the very likely possibility that Kyle will indeed outgrow the house, which would damage or even destroy your machine. “If I don’t get this thing out of the house, it will surely be destroyed. I’ve got to keep my machine safe. It’s the only way to return Kyle to his normal size and end this nightmare.”, you think to yourself. You start taking your machine, your equipment and all of its components out of the house as fast as you can. Thankfully, you had thought ahead and designed and built the main array (the part with the orb and its controls) as a removeable chassis for easier assembly / disassembly and storage. Fortunately, this also came in quite handy in cases of emergencies, which is exactly what this situation was and is.

You carefully slide the main array out of its chassis and carefully carry it downstairs as fast yet as carefully as possible. It took both of your hands to hold it and it weighed about 90 pounds, but you managed to get it out of the house safely in a matter of minutes. You carried it as far away from the house as possible and set it down at the end of the driveway, but keeping it in sight.

As you continue to evacuate the rest of your machine and its components from the house, Kyle’s head grows right through the ceiling, “Ugh!”, he exclaims. Then his shoulders, then his torso and the rest of his body follows, breaking through more of the ceiling and right through the attic until his head hits the roof. “Ow!” “Uh-oh.”, Kyle says out loud. “Ugh! Ow!” His head pushes its way through the roof with the sound of cracking wood and shingles. He passes 12 feet tall and continues to grow at an alarming rate. You watch as Kyle completely outgrows the house and wrecks it.

Kyle grows to 14 feet tall and steps out of the holes and rubble that his body created and walks out in front of what’s left of your house. Each step he takes is larger than the one before. He is now 15 feet tall and watches in awe and joy as everything in sight shrinks smaller and smaller before his very eyes, from his perspective, anyway. He loves every second of his growth spurt. Kyle yells “Yeah! This is AWESOME, Brandon! I feel great! It didn’t do anything bad to me at all! Thank you, ‘big’ brother! I wasn’t big enough before!” in a louder, reverberating voice. “You don’t THINK it did anything bad to you! Weren’t big enough?!”, you yell up to Kyle. Kyle sticks his giant tongue out at you and blows a raspberry at you (which you feel as it vibrates your body a little). “Weren’t big enough…”, you mutter to yourself. “But what do you know, you dummy? You’re just my kid brother.”, you think to yourself. You scream at Kyle “Look what you did to the house, you little brat! You’ve destroyed our house – our home! Mom and dad are going to be furious with both us!”

Kyle has stopped growing and stands a little over 16 feet tall. You watch in both awe and horror as your younger brother gets an angry look on his face, looks down at you, gets on his hands and knees and brings his face down to you – right in your face. His mouth is now wider than you are tall. His breath wafts over you like a hot breeze that smells like peanut butter. He scolds you, raising his voice to deafening levels (the volume of his voice hurts your ears) “I AM NOT LITTLE! And I’m NOT a brat!”, he emphasizes. You cover your ears as he continues to emphasize his point. “YOU’RE the LITTLE brother! I’M the BIG brother NOW!”, he yells at you. “And don’t you forget it.”, he warns you. Then he pushes you with his index finger, knocking you down on your butt again. His voice shattered the front windows of your house, neighboring houses within a 20-yard radius and several windows of various parked vehicles along both sides of the street. Several car alarms were also set off.

“How am I going to explain all of this mom and dad?”, you think to yourself. “How am I gonna to tell ‘em that their youngest son was enlarged to be bigger than a two-story house?!”, you think to yourself in a panic. “You’ll ALWAYS be the little brother to me, Kyle!”, you yell up to him. Kyle spots your machine and controls in the driveway and gets that mischievous idea again. “Oh yeah? Well maybe I haven’t made myself BIG ENOUGH! Let’s see how big I have to grow myself to MAKE you see that I’M the big brother from now on.”, Kyle retorts.

You notice him looking towards the driveway with a smile on his face and figure out what he’s got in mind. “Oh no. Not again!”, you think out loud. You start running as fast as you can towards your machine. Kyle starts walking toward it, reaching for it.

Which one of you get there and reach your machine first?

info.brief_description: [original] Brandon tests his shrinking device while taking care of his little brother.
info.description:
I felt like I needed to give back to the micro community after all these years.

This interactive is based off of a short story I wrote recently.

I don't really like setting up physical character traits in my stories. I think it's much more enjoyable for the reader to imagine how the characters look for themselves.

----
Characters:

Brandon (you): Mid-late teen

Kyle (Brandon's little brother): 9 years old
----

Feel free to add-on and deviate from the original plot.

Free-for-all

Enjoy!

(PS: If you like my stuff or have a chapter/story idea, let me know in a pm!)

[I'll add more to this interactive if someone asks for it]
